abstract.t: This document describes the behavior for the logical entity known asthe SIMPLE-XMPP Interworking Function (SIMPLE-XMPP IWF) that willallow the interworking between the SIMPLE (Session initiationprotocol for Instant Messaging and Presence Leveraging Extensions)and XMPP (eXtensible Messaging and Presence Protocol - also known asJabber protocol) protocols.
